items.title: Black Coffee
items.description: Black coffee is as simple as it gets with ground coffee beans soaked in hot water, served hot. And if you want to sound fancy, you can call black coffee by its proper name: café noir.

items.title: Latte
items.description: As the most popular coffee drink out there, the latte consists of a shot of espresso and steamed milk with just a hint of foam. It can be ordered unflavored or flavored with everything from vanilla to pumpkin spice.

items.title: Caramel Latte
items.description: If you like lattes with a special flavor, the caramel latte may be the best option to give you an experience of the natural sweetness and creaminess of steamed milk and caramel.

items.title: Cappuccino
items.description: Cappuccino is a latte made with more foam than steamed milk, often with a sprinkle of cocoa powder or cinnamon on top. Sometimes you can find variations that use cream instead of milk or ones that add flavorings as well.

items.title: Americano
items.description: With a similar flavor to black coffee, americano consists of an espresso shot diluted with hot water.

items.title: Espresso
items.description: An espresso shot can be served on its own or used as a base for most coffee drinks, such as lattes and macchiatos

items.title: Macchiato
items.description: Macchiato is another espresso-based drink that has a small amount of foam on top. It is the happy medium between a cappuccino and a doppio.

items.title: Mocha
items.description: For all the chocolate lovers out there, you will fall in love with a mocha. Mocha is a chocolate espresso drink with steamed milk and foam.

items.title: Hot Chocolate
items.description: On cold winter days, a cup of hot chocolate makes you feel comfortable and happy. It also makes you feel good because it contains energizing caffeine.

items.title: Chai Latte
items.description: If you are looking for a flavorful hot drink in the middle of winter, choose chai latte. The combination of cardamom and cinnamon provides a wonderful flavor.

items.title: Matcha Latte
items.description: Matcha latte is a green, healthy coffee drink with finely crushed matcha tea and milk, offering mild sweetness, a unique flavor and a mild caffeine kick.

items.title: Seasonal Brew
items.description: Seasonal coffee with different flavors like caramel, fruit and chocolate

items.title: Black Tea
items.description: Black tea was born in China. It is made from the leaves of a plant called Camellia and can be flavored differently with fruits for example. A pleasant, warm, flavorful and aromatic drink suitable for everyday life.

items.title: Iced latte
items.description: Iced latte is a chilled coffee drink made by blending espresso and chilled milk. It is served with ice cubes and is also known as cafè latte iced or latte on the rocks.

items.title: Iced latte Mocha
items.description: Iced latte Mocha is a combination of latte and mocha, which itself is a combination of chocolate and coffee. It gives cold drink lovers a delicious experience of chocolate and coffee.

items.title: Frapino Caramel
items.description: It is a blended or better said shaken coffee with whipped cream on top. A must for hot summer days.

items.title: Frapino Mocha
items.description: Another famous and delicious cold drink for those who prefer chocolate. Imagine the taste of a shake with chocolate and whipped cream on top.

items.title: Orange Juice
items.description: We have nothing to say about our freshly squeezed orange juice. You have to try it yourself.

items.title: Frozen Lemonade
items.description: Frozen lemonade is a refreshing summer drink that combines freshly squeezed lemon juice, ice and sweetening to create a cool, tart and sweet-tart taste sensation.

items.title: Lemonade
items.description: First known in Paris and then becoming very popular throughout Europe, this sweet, colorless, carbonated drink is made by mixing lemon juice and carbonated water
